articles.title: Asteroid the size of stadium to zoom past Earth on Saturday, says Nasa - Mint
articles.description: American space agency Nasa has said that the is hurtling towards the Earth at 18,000 miles an hour, but there is nothing to worry about
articles.content:
A huge asteroid, about the size of a stadium or thrice the size of the Taj Mahal, is heading towards Earth at a very high speed. Named '2008Go20', the asteroid will fly past the Earth on 24 July.
